trends: There has been one other sighting in Middlesex
There was one other sighting in Middlesex on or around February 7th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: i want to state that these observations made while traveling along in a car. in other words i wasn t standing sill able to make more substanciated observations. with more time my observations might have had better accuracy. also the images associated with this document are graphic representations created in photoshop and illustrator for lack of a camera that day. day 1, 10\02\04: my dad and i were driving north outside of waterbury, vt when a cloud with a very defined and rounded outline along its top came into view. i being on the passenger side the cloud was very visable to me for 5 miles or so along our travel route. the cloud itself looked as if it were heavy vapors streaming downward form something unseen. then there was the defining rounded curning shape along the top of the cloud. these annomalies by themselves brought my attention right to the cloud. and i continued to observe it for several miles. this took at least 15 or 20 minutes. and during this time the cloud never changed shape right up to the point of loosing site of it. we continued on for several miles more (aprox 10 miles). then south of richmond, vt (a mile or so) i spotted something flying very fast at very low altitude (lower than the tops of the mountains which aren t very high in vt) and silver in color. i at first thought it was a fighter jet on a practice flight. which would be unusual because in all the years of driving this rount north i have rarely seen any kind of air traffic in the area. but taking a hard look at it only revealed a flying box (rectangle). much like a tracter trailer box or shipping container of a highly reflective silver. even though it was right out in the open and approx. 1\2 mile away details could not be seen other than the definite rectangle shape and reflective silver surface. it was out of sight in a very short time. day 2, 10\03\04: my mom and i were just entering the east access road of the berlin mall, berlin, vt. my eyes wandered up to the sky and there to my supprise was another cloud similar to the one sited just the day before. but 10 times the size and at approx. the same altitude it covered a substancial portion of the shy. and very supprising there were 2 jets coming from east and west. it looked like they were converging on a point some distance just to the north of the cloud. keep in mind the invisible point of intersection for there 2 jets would be almost dead on the central top area of the cloud. very odd to see an anomilous cloud and 2 jets headed at each other. at least i don t see military interest in something i might beleive to a ufo every day.
